flawed_nl_solution:
Each book has 800 words because 100 x 80 = <<100*80=800>>800
She can finish each book in 20 minutes because 800 / 40 = <<800/40=20>>20
She will be reading for 1200 minutes because 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200
She needs to check out 60 books because 1200 / 20 = <<60=60>>60
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8000, not 800. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
